boardGameGeekName: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle – The Monster Box of Monsters Expansion
name: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle – The Monster Box of Monsters Expansion
description: Venture into the Forbidden Forest with The Monster Box of Monsters, the highly anticipated expansion to Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle  Play as Harry, Hermione, Ron, Neville or Luna Lovegood as you face frightening creatures and challenging encounters. Beware of any wrongdoing that might earn you detention! Only working together to defeat the evil forces and protecting iconic locations will make the Wizarding World safe once and for all!
